chunks.zh: 7999 的 MacBook air m3 13 寸 512+24 值得买吗
chunks.en: Is the 7999 MacBook Air M3 13-inch 512+24 worth buying?

chunks.zh: 如题
chunks.en: As the title says.

chunks.zh: 京东国补 7999 的 MacBook air m3 13 寸 512+24 值得买吗
chunks.en: Is the Jingdong subsidy price of 7999 for the MacBook Air M3 13-inch 512+24 worth buying?

chunks.zh: 目前还在用 MacBook pro 2018 15 寸 512+16 。
chunks.en: I'm currently still using a MacBook Pro 2018 15-inch 512+16.

chunks.zh: 出门旅游会拍照用一下 lr ，感觉带一个 air 会比较轻便。一般情况下只处理照片，不剪辑视频。
chunks.en: When traveling, I use LR to edit photos. I feel like bringing an Air would be lighter. I generally only process photos and don't edit videos.

chunks.zh: 现有的 mbp 用 lr 其实偶尔会有点卡顿，风扇呼呼响。
chunks.en: The existing MBP sometimes lags a bit when using LR, and the fan makes a whirring sound.

chunks.zh: 平时可能会本地部署个模型，qwen 之类的，辅助写写代码。可能还会跑个本地 k8s 集群玩一下玩具项目。
chunks.en: I might deploy a model locally, like Qwen, to help with coding. I might also run a local K8s cluster to play with toy projects.

chunks.zh: 现有的 mbp 跑个 k8s 挺吃力的，不过感觉主要是 docker 的锅。部模型就更呛了
chunks.en: The existing MBP struggles to run K8s, but I feel the main issue is Docker. Running a local model is even more challenging.

chunks.zh: 不知道 m3 air 性能够不够用。我应该再继续蹲 m4 air 吗
chunks.en: I'm not sure if the M3 Air has enough performance. Should I wait for the M4 Air?

chunks.zh: @boubuo 保修在授权和直营都可以呀
chunks.en: @boubuo The warranty is valid at both authorized and direct stores.

chunks.zh: 没赶上好时候，我同配置 15 寸的，1w2 买的
chunks.en: I missed the good timing. I bought the same configuration 15-inch for 12,000.

chunks.zh: 你去线下的授权店，能用国补的，大概率会比这个还便宜。
chunks.en: If you go to an offline authorized store, you can use the national subsidy, which will likely be cheaper than this.

chunks.zh: 这一款是 7199 ，为什么要花 7999
chunks.en: This one is 7199, why spend 7999?

chunks.zh: 线下渠道 7199 ，建议问下线下授权店
chunks.en: Offline channels offer it for 7199. I suggest checking with an offline authorized store.

chunks.zh: 等 m4
chunks.en: Wait for M4.

chunks.zh: @longzhou6431 是说线下 Apple 授权店 不是直营店吗
chunks.en: @longzhou6431 Are you referring to offline Apple authorized stores, not direct stores?

chunks.zh: 娘的，去年 10 月份在越南买的 16+256 ，还花了 9000 出头
chunks.en: Damn, I bought a 16+256 in Vietnam last October and still spent over 9000.

chunks.zh: @willygeek007 从来没在授权店买过。保修是不是也可以去 Apple 直营店的呢？
chunks.en: @willygeek007 I've never bought from an authorized store. Can I still get the warranty service at an Apple direct store?

chunks.zh: 我也在观望中，还是等等 M4 ，万一有惊喜
chunks.en: I'm also waiting and seeing. I'll wait for the M4 in case there's a surprise.

chunks.zh: 多花了 800 块钱，不值得
chunks.en: It's not worth spending an extra 800 yuan.

chunks.zh: jd 线下 7199
chunks.en: JD offline is 7199.

chunks.zh: 现在这个配置都 7199  不要花冤枉钱
chunks.en: This configuration is now 7199. Don't waste your money.

chunks.zh: 我买了 128 的配合 nas 美滋滋
chunks.en: I bought the 128GB version and it works great with a NAS.

chunks.zh: 广州 7199 问了好几家都说活动没了  不知道周边还有没有
chunks.en: I asked several stores in Guangzhou about the 7199 price, and they all said the promotion is over. I don't know if there are any around.

chunks.zh: 不值得，因为那些需求都不是刚需，要是忍不了就早换了，再等等吧。
chunks.en: It's not worth it because those needs aren't essential. If you couldn't stand it, you would have replaced it long ago. Wait a bit longer.

chunks.zh: 不值得最近买的一台 mac air m3 24g+512 7199线下京东 mall  用云闪付国补
chunks.en: Not worth it. I recently bought a Mac Air M3 24G+512 for 7199 at an offline JD Mall using UnionPay's national subsidy.

chunks.zh: 深圳线下叠加店家优惠 还能减 200
chunks.en: In Shenzhen, you can get an additional 200 discount with store promotions offline.

chunks.zh: 7199 这价格，想把 m1p32g 换了😂
chunks.en: At this price of 7199, I want to replace my M1P 32G.😂

chunks.zh: @tanranran #16 那是买的早，现在深圳基本买不到
chunks.en: @tanranran #16 That's because you bought it early. It's basically impossible to buy it in Shenzhen now.
